name: Klean Kanteen Kid Vacuum Classic Sport Cap
description: A kid-sized bottle with amazing insulating properties. Double-wall insulation keeps warm drinks toasty for up to 12 hours and iced drinks frosty for 40.Made of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that's easy to keep clean.Double-wall vacuum insulation.Klean Coat™ chip-resistant, powder coat finish. Using the chemical hazard assessment known as GreenSceen®, Klean Kanteen offers a material that's safe for humans and benign in the environment.Large 44mm (1.75in.) opening fits ice cubes and makes for easy filling and cleaning.
